item.title: Greed & Pump Soundtrack is now available!
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Website Redesign is Live
item.description: I updated this website to focus on my music instead of being a personal blog!
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Greed & Pump is Out!
item.description: I recently participated in the Brackeys game jam and did music for a game called Greed & Pump. Check it out! Play it in your browser.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: My New Synth
item.description: I'm getting back into music everyone! Check me out on social media if you wanna keep up.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Ringtones & Notifications
item.description: Check out these free ringtone and notification noises I made.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: O Come O Come Emmanuel (Trap Remix)
item.description: Decided to release a trap remix of the ol' Christmas classic to me making a VR christmas tree :).
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Remnants has been Released!
item.description: I just released my new album: Remnants! Check it out on the music page for more details.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Update to the "Where is my Music?" list
item.description: Here's some random vids I found using my music. I've updated the list on the music page as well.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Whats On My Screen?
item.description: Jammed with a good buddy and came up with this. He was on the drums, I did synth and vocals. Just lettin' it out man. What's going on in this fucked up crazy world?
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Groove Masta Putz - The Shit Show... for Mother Base
item.description: Came home late last night and got inspired to write some raps. Decided I wanted to rap over The Base from Sonic Adventure 2 so I spruced it up and wrote about the Earth as a base. That's also why the title is how it is, cause all the songs on the soundtrack are named and for a specific level.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Groove Masta Putz - Morning Rise
item.description: Woke up this morning and decided go on a musical journey until I came up with this demo. Could expand later, but in the meantime let this take you on a journey through... T H E F U T U R E.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Groove Masta Putz - The Time It Takes
item.description: Played on the Casio before going to bed. There's not enough time in the day. So I played in the night. Headphones encouraged.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: True Delusions - Song for Judee Sill and Other Songs
item.description: In the course of asking people what they'd like to see on the blog, Justin Haze of True Delusions reached out asking if I could review his album. Click to read the full review!
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz

item.title: Groove Masta Putz - Forward
item.description: New beat! This one is a little old, but since I haven't had an outlet to post music to I haven't really put it out there. It's called "Forward", because that's what I was feeling in my life at the time (and still feel). Recorded with my Casio CTK-720, which is the derpy piano I got in middle school that's pictured above. Used renoise to mix, master and add the bass & strings.
item.dc:creator: Groove Masta Putz
